item.title: 特朗普与美国国家海洋和大气管理局的斗争远不止天气这么简单
item.description: 美国国家海洋和大气管理局（NOAA）已成为唐纳德-特朗普总统裁减联邦工作人员和对行政部门机构施加新限制计划的目标。【原文：The US National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration, or NOAA, has emerged as a target of President Donald Trump’s program of downsizing the federal workforce and imposing new restrictions on executive branch agencies.】

item.title: 电动汽车需求下滑，保时捷德国工厂将裁员 1900 人
item.description: 由于电动汽车需求疲软以及 "具有挑战性的地缘政治和经济条件"，保时捷公司将在本十年末裁员1900人。【原文：Porsche AG will trim its workforce by 1,900 employees by the end of the decade in response to weak electric vehicle demand and “challenging geopolitical and economic conditions.”】

item.title: 俄罗斯油轮船队因上个月美国制裁而严重受阻
item.description: 美国对俄罗斯石油贸易的最新制裁导致运送莫斯科原油的大量油轮停航；这一措施在任何有关结束乌克兰战争的谈判中都具有重要意义。【原文：The latest US sanctions on Russia’s oil trade have brought a swath of tankers that deliver Moscow’s crude to a halt — reinforcing the significance of the measures in any negotiations over ending the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 矿业交易商弗罗曼退休，西班业任命斯图尔特为首席执行官
item.description: 资深交易员 Neal Froneman 将卸任 Sibanye Stillwater Ltd. 首席执行官一职，并于 9 月底将这家南非矿业公司的帅印移交给 Richard Stewart。【原文：Veteran dealmaker Neal Froneman will retire as chief executive officer of Sibanye Stillwater Ltd., handing over the reins of the South African mining company to Richard Stewart at the end of September.】

item.title: 加利福尼亚州 10 亿美元的保险公司救助加深了住房压力
item.description: 加州的住房市场已经是全国最昂贵的市场之一。旧金山一套公寓的价格相当于德克萨斯州一栋四居室的房子，一些家庭驱车数小时前往内陆地区，只为寻找一套起步房。【原文：California’s housing market is already one of the most expensive in the country. A San Francisco condo can cost as much as a four-bedroom house in Texas and families drive hours inland just to find a starter home.】

item.title: 厄瓜多尔债券投资者因担心大选后的 "混乱 "而撤退
item.description: 几周前，厄瓜多尔的民调显示，对市场友好的现任总统丹尼尔-诺沃亚（Daniel Noboa）将在第一轮选举中获胜，投资者因此对厄瓜多尔的美元债券趋之若鹜。随后，路易莎-冈萨雷斯（Luisa González）上台了。【原文：Investors a few weeks ago had piled into Ecuador’s dollar bonds, taking comfort in polls that showed Daniel Noboa, the incumbent, market-friendly president, cruising to a first-round victory. Then came Luisa González.】

item.title: 没有本田的帮助，日产汽车为何举步维艰？
item.description: 自 "成本杀手 "首席执行官卡洛斯-戈恩（Carlos Ghosn）于2018年戏剧性地下台以来，日本日产汽车公司一直在销售疲软和车型阵容过时的困境中苦苦挣扎。【原文：Since the dramatic downfall of “Cost Killer” chief executive Carlos Ghosn in 2018, Japan’s Nissan Motor Co. has labored with weak sales and an outdated model lineup.】

item.title: 马拉维暂时禁止所有矿产出口以修订规则
item.description: 马拉维政府暂时禁止出口所有矿产品，以便该国矿业部简化程序。【原文：Malawi’s government placed a temporary ban the exports of all minerals to allow the country’s Ministry of Mining to streamline procedures.】

item.title: 食品和能源价格上涨导致美国批发通胀超预期
item.description: 由于食品和能源成本上升，1 月份美国批发价格回升，这表明在特朗普政府征收关税之前，通胀方面的进展有限。【原文：US wholesale prices picked up in January on higher food and energy costs, highlighting only limited progress on inflation ahead of tariffs imposed by the Trump administration.】

item.title: 英国军方首脑警告财政部2.5%的开支目标无法实现
item.description: 在英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）准备做出一项可能使他与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）发生冲突的预算决定之际，英国国防首脑私下警告政府，将军事经费提高到经济产出 2.5% 的计划是不够的。【原文：UK defense chiefs have privately warned the government that plans to raise military funding to 2.5% of economic output won’t be enough, as Prime Minister Keir Starmer prepares to make a budget decision that could put him at odds with US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: Meta 在欧盟反垄断冲突中向竞争对手开放 Facebook Marketplace
item.description: Meta Platforms Inc.正在向众多分类广告竞争对手开放其之前一直守口如瓶的 Facebook Marketplace 平台，再次试图遵守具有里程碑意义的欧盟反垄断命令，该命令附带 7.98 亿欧元（约合 8.29 亿美元）的罚款。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. is prying open its previously guarded Facebook Marketplace platform to a swathe of classified ads rivals, in a renewed attempt to comply with a landmark European Union antitrust order that was accompanied by a €798 million ($829 million) fine.】

item.title: 贝恩因南非禁令长达十年而陷入法律纠纷
item.description: 贝恩公司（Bain & Co.【原文：Bain & Co. is fighting a legal battle against South African finance and tax authorities in a bid to overturn a decade-long ban on doing business with the state after becoming embroiled in a corruption scandal.】

item.title: 意大利电信向意大利联合信贷银行寻求咨询意见，因为求购者络绎不绝
item.description: 知情人士透露，意大利电信公司（Telecom Italia SpA）已聘请意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）帮助评估其选择方案，以寻找意大利前电话垄断企业的收购者。【原文：Telecom Italia SpA has hired UniCredit SpA to help evaluate its options as suitors circle the former Italian phone monopoly, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 匈牙利电池产量下滑，欧尔班的电动汽车希望破灭
item.description: 匈牙利电池行业的产量在去年年底急剧下降，削弱了总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）关于电动汽车需求将有助于扭转经济的赌注。【原文：Hungary’s battery-sector output plummeted at the end of last year, undermining Prime Minister Viktor Orban’s bet that demand for electric vehicles will help turn round the economy.】

item.title: 阿联酋铝生产商 EGA 瞄准关税下的更多美国交易
item.description: 阿联酋全球铝业公司（Emirates Global Aluminium）在去年达成初步交易后，正计划收购更多美国资产，因为美国对进口金属征收关税提高了美国市场的价格。【原文：Emirates Global Aluminium is planning additional acquisitions of US assets after an initial deal last year as tariffs on metal imports into the country raise prices in that market.】

item.title: 贸易紧张局势加剧，杰里米-格兰瑟姆的 GMO 首推避开中国的 ETF
item.description: 杰里米-格兰瑟姆（Jeremy Grantham）位于波士顿的投资公司正在利用华尔街对完全避开中国的新兴市场策略的普遍需求，因为投资者正在为唐纳德-特朗普的贸易敌对姿态给全球供应链带来的新的混乱做准备。【原文：Jeremy Grantham’s Boston-based investment firm is tapping into popular demand on Wall Street for emerging-market strategies that avoid China altogether, as investors prep for fresh disruptions across global supply chains on the back of Donald Trump’s combative trade posture.】

item.title: 石油供应过剩或挤压的风险都在减小
item.description:
盈余前景和制裁威胁同时消退。【原文：

The prospect of a surplus and the threat from sanctions fade at the same time.

】

item.title: 德国要求豁免天然气储存充气目标
item.description: 德国呼吁免除欧盟今年的天然气储存充气目标，因为人们担心这一要求会助长市场投机并推高气价。【原文：Germany called for exemptions from the European Union’s gas storage filling targets this year amid fears that the requirement is driving market speculation and pushing up prices.】

item.title: 史蒂夫-麦登将以 3.6 亿美元收购英国鞋履品牌 Kurt Geiger
item.description: Steven Madden Ltd. 同意以约 2.89 亿英镑（约合 3.6 亿美元）的现金收购奢侈鞋类和时尚配饰品牌 Kurt Geiger Ltd.。【原文：Steven Madden Ltd. agreed to acquire luxury footwear and fashion accessory brand Kurt Geiger Ltd. for about £289 million ($360 million) in cash.】

item.title: 通胀预期重回美联储利率争论焦点
item.description: 我是塞西尔-道拉特（Cécile Daurat），美国经济学编辑。今天我们关注的是通胀预期。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Cécile Daurat, an economics editor in the US. item.title: 特朗普今日誓言互征关税，但未透露细节
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他将于周四宣布对等关税，承诺兑现他的威胁，对那些对美国商品征收更高关税的国家的进口商品征收关税。【原文：President Donald Trump said he would announce reciprocal tariffs on Thursday, promising to deliver on his threat to slap tariffs on imports from countries that impose higher duties on US goods.】

item.title: 法国人工智能峰会为商业而非政治成功奠定基础
item.description:
该活动被称为 "国际治理的舞台"，但大部分时间是作为交流会进行的

。【原文：

Billed as a setting for international governance, the event mostly delivered as a networking session

】

item.title: 创下销售记录后，英国债务主管看到了到期的 "甜蜜点
item.description: 英国债务管理办公室本周创纪录地出售了 10 年期债券，看来它将利用投资者的胃口，继续倾向于发行较短期的债券。【原文：The UK’s Debt Management Office looks set to continue skewing issuance toward shorter-maturity bonds as it capitalizes on investor appetite for a record sale of 10-year notes this week.】

item.title: 德国最繁忙的港口如何看待即将到来的贸易战
item.description: 在汉堡，没有人确定唐纳德-特朗普总统的美国关税政策会对德国最大的海港产生什么影响。【原文：No one in Hamburg is sure just what the impact of President Donald Trump’s US tariffs will be on Germany’s largest seaport.】

item.title: 史蒂夫-麦登即将达成收购库尔特-盖格鞋履品牌的交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，史蒂文-麦登有限公司（Steven Madden Ltd.）正接近达成一项交易，从私募股权公司 Cinven 手中收购同为奢侈鞋履和时尚配饰品牌的库尔特-盖格有限公司（Kurt Geiger Ltd.）。【原文：Steven Madden Ltd. is nearing a deal to acquire fellow luxury footwear and fashion accessory brand Kurt Geiger Ltd. from private equity firm Cinven, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 交易员押注乌克兰和平，欧元乘势回升
item.description: 欧元因乌克兰和谈前景而反弹，令人印象深刻地表明，自近三年前俄罗斯入侵以来，欧洲资产已出现折价。【原文：The euro’s rally on the prospect of Ukraine peace talks is an impressive demonstration of the discount on European assets since Russia’s invasion almost three years ago.】

item.title: 卡塔尔收购陷入僵局，德国将延长俄罗斯石油公司托管期
item.description: 由于向卡塔尔主权财富基金出售俄罗斯国有石油巨头俄罗斯石油公司（Rosneft PJSC）的计划仍未达成，德国将第五次延长对该公司当地子公司的托管。【原文：Germany is set to extend its trusteeship over local subsidiaries of Russia’s state oil giant Rosneft PJSC for a fifth time as a sale to Qatar’s sovereign wealth fund remains in limbo.】

item.title: 本田与日产分道扬镳，双方问题均未解决
item.description: 本田汽车公司和日产汽车公司已正式分道扬镳，至少现在是这样。【原文：Honda Motor Co. and Nissan Motor Co. have officially parted ways, at least for now.】

item.title: 苹果公司的股市表现越来越像中国制造
item.description: 美国最大公司的投资者越来越关注中国，苹果公司正努力赢得中国这一重要的客户群，同时也面临着关税相关的风险。【原文：Investors in America’s biggest company are increasingly focused on China, where Apple Inc. is striving to win over a crucial customer base while also facing tariff-related risks.】

item.title: 塞尔维亚在政治动荡和全球价格风险中保持利率不变
item.description: 塞尔维亚连续第五个月维持借贷成本不变，原因是通胀依然高企，而且该国面临着政治动荡和全球贸易紧张局势带来的更多价格风险。【原文：Serbia left borrowing costs unchanged for a fifth month as inflation remains elevated and the country faces more price risks from political turbulence and global trade tensions.】
